titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide penalties for the distribution or manufacture of a controlled substance within 1000 feet of a Head Start facility.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5298-5299)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/5/1994--Introduced. Amends the Controlled Substances Act to provide penalties for the distribution or manufacture of a controlled substance within 1000 feet of a Head Start facility.
